67.title: Find Out Who Got a PPP Loan with ProPublica's New Tool - Lifehacker
67.description: Are you curious to see if your employer or local businesses got a slice of the government’s $2.2 trillion stimulus package? This week, ProPublica, an independent, non-profit newsroom, released a new Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) tracking tool.

68.title: Exclusive: Denver-based tech company announces employees will work from home permanently - Denver Business Journal

69.author: Melissa Repko
69.title: Walgreens swings to a quarterly loss as coronavirus drives up costs, lowers doctor visits; shares fall - CNBC
69.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance said its profits were squeezed by a shift in sales to low-margin items, increased supply-chain costs and higher expenses for labor and store cleaning.
69.content: Walgreens Boots Alliance said Thursday that the pandemic hurt its fiscal third-quarter results as fewer people went to the doctor and got prescriptions and the company spent more to staff and clean s… [+4414 chars]
